Name: amh-muhammedsadiqan-lad
Author: Muhammed Sadiq And Muhammed Sani Habib

Translations.Text: ti’izazachinimi inide ‘ayini k’its’ibeti ānidīti (k’ali) iniji lēla āyidelemi፡፡
yešerutimi negeri hulu bemets’iḥāfochi wisit’i newi፡፡
ālahini ferīwochu be’ātikilitochina bewenizochi wisit’i nachewi፡፡
(inerisumi widik’i k’alina mewiwenijeli belēlebeti) be’iwineti mek’emech’a wisit’i chayi yehonewi niguši zenidi nachewi፡፡
bewisit’wa isheti bale shīfanochi yeẖonu zenibabawochimi yalubati sitiẖoni፡፡
yegeleba balebēti yeẖone k’init’atimi፡፡ bale melikami me‘āza k’it’elochimi (yalubati sitiẖoni)፡፡
(sewochina ganēnochi hoyi!) kegētachihumi ts’egawochi beyetinyawi tasitebabilalachihu
sewini inide shekila kemīk’ich’elech’eli derek’i ch’ik’a fet’erewi፡፡
